title: Bug 117981 - Unable to select item at first attempt in library outline view
description:
Description: When trying to select an item in the library outline view, it is not possible to select it on the first attempt.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label in a library file.
2. Open the library outline view.
3. Attempt to select the label item.

Actual Results: The label item cannot be selected on the first attempt.
Expected Results: The label item should be selectable on the first attempt.
OB: When selecting an item in the library outline view for the first time, it is not possible to select the item.
EB: The second time I select the label item, it can be selected.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Add a label in a library file.
2. Open the library outline view.
3. Attempt to select the label item.
